Primary Contact: Brian Burnham, Director - Operations; Email: brian@commconn.ca
Alternate Contact: Jacqueline Burnham, Director - Strategic Management; Email: jacqueline@commconn.ca
Service Details: Provides services for those who live with a developmental disability, including home share and respite coordination for adults, a residential service where an individual is supported with one-to-one staffing support, and a community support program for more than 80 individuals.  Community support program includes individual services and facilitated group programs such as: guys group, ladies who lunch, walking club, craft group, cooking club, trips to Vancouver for hockey or soccer games, as well as an annual retreat.  Services are often based on social and recreational opportunities for the individual.
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upHome sharing, community support, residential, and respite support services for adults are accessed by referral from Community Living BC (CLBC).
